name: mounted sling
description: This very wide sling could potentially propell it's contents to a high velocity. It can, however, only be used when supported correctly.

name: handmade guncotton rifle
description: A homemade rifle specifically reinforced to fire charges using guncotton as a propellant. Quite a bit heavier than your standard rifle due to the reinforcements made, also not terrible efficient overall.

name: heavy guncotton rifle
description: An improved rifle resembling a musket design, though in size just short of an elephant gun. Coming with a heavily reinforced barrel to withstand any potential blowback, this rifle can reliably fire guncotton-propelled ammo and deliver lots of pain.
